name: Let the World End While I'm Here
name_original: Let the World End While I'm Here
description:
Let the World End While I'm Here is a 2D rhythm-adventure game set at the end of the world. Follow a song from across the ocean in this narrative journey, overcoming impossible obstacles to find the voice calling out to you. Test your determination (and your rhythm) in a final adventure!

Features

Beautiful and expansive environments to discover along your journey.

Unique rhythm mechanics that will test your skills and determination.

          

Original song and soundtrack composed for this narrative.

Controls

Note: Xbox controls are not supported on the Mac version.
